io.realm.permissions

Class PermissionRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.realm.permissions.PermissionRequest

  • public final class PermissionRequest
extends Object
    This class represents the intent of giving a set of permissions to some users for some Realm(s).

    If the request is successful, a Permission entry will be added to each affected users PermissionManager, where it can be fetched using PermissionManager.getPermissions(PermissionManager.PermissionsCallback)

    See Also:
    PermissionManager.applyPermissions(PermissionRequest, PermissionManager.ApplyPermissionsCallback), PermissionManager.getPermissions(PermissionManager.PermissionsCallback)

    • Constructor Detail

      • PermissionRequest

        public PermissionRequest(UserCondition condition,
                         String realmUrl,
                         AccessLevel accessLevel)
        Creates a description of a set of permissions granted to some users for some Realms.
        Parameters:
        realmUrl - the Realm URL whose permissions settings should be changed. Use * to change the permissions of all Realms managed by the user sending this request. The user that wants to grant these permissions must have administrative rights to those Realms.
        condition - the conditions used to match which users are effected.
        accessLevel - the AccessLevel to grant matching users. Setting the access level is absolute i.e., it may revoke permissions for users that previously had a higher access level. To revoke all permissions, use AccessLevel.NONE.

    • Method Detail

      • getAccessLevel

        public AccessLevel getAccessLevel()
        Returns the access level that users will be granted if the request is successful.
        Returns:
        the AccessLevel users will have once this request is successfully handled.

      • getCondition

        public UserCondition getCondition()
        Returns the UserCondition used to match users. Those users that match will be granted the the AccessLevel defined by getAccessLevel().
        Returns:
        the condition used to match users.

      • getUrl

        public String getUrl()
        The Realm URL for which the permissions are granted. * is returned if the request should match all Realms, for which the user sending the request, has administrative rights.
        Returns:
        the Realm URL for which the permissions should be granted.
        See Also:
        Permission.mayManage()
